title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Well-Being Integrated Learning Design: Simulations for Secondary Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can design virtual classroom scenarios by applying the four core principles of the WILD framework: environment building, relationship formation, self-reflection, and social connection.
Learners can diagnose students' emotional needs in a VR simulation environment and propose well-being support strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Participants can develop and evaluate at least three well-being education activity modules applicable to real-world educational settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
